text:
Stockard Channing (born Susan Williams Antonia Stockard; February 13, 1944) is an American actress. She played Betty in "Grease" and First Lady Abbey Bartlet in the show "The West Wing" on NBC. She has also starred in many movies during her acting career. Channing was born February 13, 1944.
Channing won multiple Emmy Awards, a Tony Award and a Drama Desk Award.
